version_description:
- Added in-app purchase to remove ads!
- Fixed bug where coin multiplier doesn't work for some devices. I apologize for the bug.

- Added in-app purchase to remove ads!
- Fixed bug where coin multiplier doesn't work for some devices. I apologize for the bug.

- On certain devices, users were experiencing some lag due to the previous update; it should be fixed with this patch. Thank you guys for your support. Also note that purchasing removeADs will remove any lag if there is any.
